programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Lisa helps a man who longs to discover his biological roots, but fears rejection from his unknown family. Chris helps a woman deal with guilt over the effects her birth may have had the life of her then 14-year-old mother.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet hopes Lisa can help him make amends for the past by locating the daughter he lost custody of over forty years ago. A woman's struggle to fit in takes a surprising turn when Chris reveals a series of stunning coincidences very close to home.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Lindsey says her vows surrounded by nature, while Erika takes the elevator to her chic penthouse nuptials.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Lisa's wedding guests buzz about her beehive-shaped cake, while Andria's guests are surprised by her rock star performance.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Amber has created an elegant black tie affair themed wedding for her big day, but Anastasia and Jena think their winter wonderland themed weddings are the best.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: After rejecting Christine's idea of moving back to Utah, Kody checks in with Janelle and Robyn. Then, Kody says he now wants his own lot on the property, and the family discusses the possibility of spending the holidays apart.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Janelle's kids have strong opinions about Kody's COVID rules, and Kody makes a surprise visit to Meri's. Then, Kody organizes an outdoor get-together for the whole family - their first time seeing each other in months.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The wives come to a major decision about the property lots. Christine is leaving to take Ysabel to New Jersey for surgery, but Kody's refusal to go leaves Christine angry. Then, a member of the family has a big announcement.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Meri and Janelle talk through old wounds after the family spins off in four directions. Christine takes Ysabel to have surgery in New Jersey, Janelle helps out while Evie gets foot surgery in North Carolina, Meri is in Utah, and Kody and Robyn stay home.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.sub-title: All the Leaves Fell off My Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman's world is shaken when she discovers at 25 that she was adopted. As she searches for her birth mother, more dramatic revelations are in store. A mother is in a race against time to find her son, whom she put up for adoption 46 years ago.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.sub-title: The Last Time I Saw My Mother, I Was 5 Years Old
programme.desc: A man searches for his birth mother, whose disappearance when he was 5 years old has haunted him his entire life. A woman hoping to meet any member of her biological family is able to heal the emotional wounds of a total stranger.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A man who always longed for a sibling stumbles upon a shocking family murder, and Chris reveals clues to new revelations.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.sub-title: If I'd Only Known About Her
programme.desc: A woman longs to meet her birth father, a man she credits for saving her life during an emotionally difficult childhood even though they never met.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two sisters are searching for their birth mother, and ask Chris to help them uncover the reason for their adoption. Then, Lisa helps a mother find the daughters she placed for adoption, with hopes of answering some of her burning questions.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Lisa tackles the challenging mystery of why a woman was abandoned in a trash can as a baby. Unexpected DNA results throw a woman's entire identity into question - but no one is prepared for the shocking details Chris unearths about the day she was born.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.sub-title: She Chose Another Person Over Her Child
programme.desc: Lisa helps a man locate his birth mother hoping to answer why she chose to marry a man that didn't want him in their lives. A woman enlists Chris's help to search for the biological mother who abandoned her at a babysitter's house when she was an infant.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Dr. Lee hurries to fulfill the Christmas wishes of her patients to look their best before all the inevitable holiday parties and festive photos, then treats us all to her annual pimple-inspired Christmas carol!

programme.sub-title: Randy, I Think I Got This

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Four Weddings

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: UK
programme.desc: Thigh high splits and plunging necklines might look hot on the red carpet but perhaps not on the wedding aisle. Find out how much a bride should really dare to bare!

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Dana is shopping with her two bridesmen for an edgy wedding dress. Akisha brings her fiancé's best man to her appointment to represent her husband's opinion.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Cheryl has recently beaten breast cancer and had her last reconstructive surgery a week ago. Jennifer is battling a rare kidney disease, and Kristin is overcoming stage four lung cancer. For these brides, their weddings are a celebration of love and life.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Tanya brings her outspoken family to help her find a blush-coloured dress. Mary Beth, who has ovarian cancer, is excited to dress shop with three generations of family members. Stella decides to bring only her mother to her first fitting.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: It's a family affair as the sister of star NBA player Stephen Curry hunts for her dream wedding dress. Cami Lee is back with her over the top mom who will stop at nothing to make sure Cami doesn't get a black dress, including hunting Randy down for help.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel's nursing school graduation is finally here. Winter is back together with Jah, and no one has spoken to Royal and Angenette since the Philippines. Nicole is in hot water with Pedro and Lidia for choosing Alejandro over her family.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: At Chantel's graduation party, the family comes down on Jah about hiding his son from Winter. Nicole goes in for her breast implant surgery and afterwards gets a shocking reaction from Alejandro. Pedro and Chantel start their search for a house.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: River goes on a whirlwind date with his new girlfriend. Nicole is ready to show off her new body. Jah and Winter's date night takes some unexpected turns. Pedro arrives in New York and gets into it with Nicole's boyfriend, Alejandro.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: The family heads to South Carolina to find out more about their ancestry, and Winter causes tension by unexpectedly bringing Jah. Pedro connects with his estranged cousin. Nicole fills in Coraima on the details of Alejandro's unfaithfulness.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Pedro has enough of Chantel's judgement of his family. River is in the hot seat when he gets interrogated by Megan's friends. Alejandro seeks out relationship advice from his aunt and pleads for Nicole to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Karen hosts a holiday party for the whole family. Lidia vents to Pedro about Nicole's decision to get back with Alejandro. River and Pedro go on a mission for the perfect Christmas tree. Jah surprises Winter.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Pedro arrives in the Dominican Republic to make peace between his family members, only to make matters worse. Winter and Jah host a dinner for the family to reveal their engagement. River decides to introduce Karen and Chantel to his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel and Karen meet River's girlfriend. Pedro and Nicole learn more about his father's past and their family history. After a big fight with Jah, Winter reveals things about her relationship that she had been keeping from her family.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: The family finds creative ways to help Winter let go of her relationship with Jah. Chantel decides to fly to the Dominican Republic to support Pedro after Nicole and Lidia both turn against him for disrespecting the family.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Nature lovers show up for Discover Wild New Hampshire Day. Officers conduct an undercover surveillance. Officer McKee rescues a starving owl from the side of the road. Later on, Mount Monadnock, a perilous rescue of an injured hiker.

programme.title: Gold Rush: The Dirt
programme.desc: Mine Rescue mavericks Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra invite The Dirt to Freddy's sprawling Colorado retreat. Freddy reveals his hometown operations, shows off a few prized possessions and hosts a Cajun boil where he meets baby Freddy for the first time.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officers St. Pierre, Benvenuti and K9 Cora investigate a couple accused of road hunting. An actress tries to perform her way out of a ticket with Officer Hannett. Officer Holmes gets an injured goose call and Officer Frye handles a neighbor dispute.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens, the National Guard, and dozens of volunteers team up in a massive, days-long search for a hiker missing in the vast wilderness of the White Mountains. And, the wardens take on some familiar faces in a charity softball game.

programme.title: Gold Rush: The Dirt
programme.desc: Mine Rescue mavericks Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra invite The Dirt to Freddy's sprawling Colorado retreat. Freddy reveals his hometown operations, shows off a few prized possessions and hosts a Cajun boil where he meets baby Freddy for the first time.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Canfield responds to a call about an orphaned bear cub. Sgt. Lucas pays an unexpected visit to a hunter suspected of illegal baiting. And Officer Cyrs investigates a large buck shot by a young, nervous hunter during muzzleloader season.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Pre-dawn on opening day of rifle season, Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett pursue a night hunter. While up north, Officers Canfield and St. Pierre battle the snow to work a deer decoy. And in the city, Officer Frye wrestles an aggressive wild turkey.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Fluette and Moxie attend their graduation. Officer Holmes and trainee McDermott investigate a possible illegal bait site and run a decoy operation with Officer Egan. Sergeant Lucas checks on a moose with odd behavior.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Bronson questions a hunter who shot a deer without the proper permit, while Officer Demler runs radar on a popular snowmobile trail. Sgt. Lucas investigates a suspicious deer kill site. And Officer Cyrs responds to a snowmobile accident.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Hannett patrols for ice fishermen while Lt. Boudreau investigates a hunter who shot towards a road. Officer Holmes deals with a raccoon hiding in a warm chimney. And later, Officer St. Pierre goes on his first dive recovery under the ice.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Cyrs gets a call about a rabid fox that attacked a homeowner. Officer Crouse tracks down a group of ATV riders. Lt. Murphy talks to a farmer about a nuisance bear. Officers Frye and Jones investigate a hunter that may have shot from the road.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Conservation Officers statewide join forces with volunteers and the National Guard to launch an intensive search for a missing hiker. In Littleton, Officer McKee gets news of a bear who has infiltrated a home in search of food.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett have an unusually busy day on ATV patrol. Officer McDermott investigates a man who illegally shot a rabbit in a residential area. Officers Holmes and Cyrs use ATVs to rescue an injured hiker on Mount Carter.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lt. Mike Eastman investigates a case of stolen lobster traps. A man on a dirt bike flees the scene after being stopped for speeding, and Officer Hannett sends an injured pigeon to a local wildlife rehabber.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Sgt. Pushee leads a multi-agency rescue mission to find a missing kayaker. A specialist is called in to locate a pesky bear roaming a residential area, and a boy is caught riding without a helmet and operating his ATV illegally.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With the help of local police, Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett remove campers found illegally occupying state property. An 8-year-old boy is found riding solo on an ATV, and Officer Crouse helps two raccoon cubs found on the road.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer McDermott finds an abandoned truck, sparking a winding investigation. Officer Holmes and Sgt. Lucas rescue paddlers of a capsized canoe. Later, Holmes responds to a moose accident, while OFC. Frye consoles a bereft woman.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: During a busy "Old Home Day.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett revisit their most memorable moments: pursuing out-of-control dirt bikers, questioning dishonest hunters, investigating illegal pet alligators, chasing down burglary suspects, and more.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In this special episode of North Woods Law, Sergeant Glen Lucas walks through some of his most memorable cases while also providing insight into what was happening behind the scenes. Cases include his car accident, memorable hunting cases, and more.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: This special episode highlights the New Hampshire Conservation Officer's most exciting interactions with the state's wildlife, including encounters with bears, moose, hawks, fawns, skunks and the endangered timber rattlesnake.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: On Mt. Monadnock, a severed finger is found, sending a team and K-9 Wyatt to search for other possible body parts. A family of repeat offenders are found riding their ATVs without proper protective gear, and a man admits to an illegal bear kill.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Bronson revisits some of his most memorable moments while on the job. Bronson recalls facing his fear of snakes, exposing an illegal deer hunter, and encountering a man with an unusual definition of fishing.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When a man responsible for a fatal car accident flees the scene, Officer McKee responds to the call. An injured hiker is rescued from a trail in Franconia Notch State Park, and an illegal pheasant hunter is reported.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A horrific rock climbing accident on Cannon Cliffs sends two officers and an emergency team on a heroic helicopter rescue mission. A combative man is found illegally ridding an OHRV and is questioned by Officer Crouse, and a moose causes a traffic jam.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A deer hunter pleads ignorance when caught with tree stands on private property. Officer Crouse catches a group of ATV speedsters, and Officer MacFazden investigates a suspicious bear kill.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A team is deployed to relocate a moose that has found its way into the city. During an undercover mission, Officer Egan encounters multiple violating bird hunters, while Officer Canfield rushes to rescue an injured hiker trapped on Mount Carrigain.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Canfield handles a group of ATV riders reported for riding prohibited trails. Officer Holmes investigates a suspected illegal deer kill, and an abandoned car is found on the Androscoggin River that might be linked to a crime.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Sgt. Lopashanski attempts every trick in the book to wrangle a stubborn moose off of a busy roadway. Officer Canfield plays a game of cat and mouse with a suspected illegal deer hunter, and Officer McKee and Demler investigate an illegal turkey kill.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Masucci and Major Walsh join forces to summon a man for baiting without a permit. Officer Bronson pursues a pair of ATV speedsters riding with a toddler with no safety gear, and Lieutenant Cheney responds to a call about a deer wedged in a fence.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Bronson investigates a teen's social media post, boasting of illegally shooting a deer. Officer Canfield confronts a hunter over multiple violations. And, the dive team searches for a boat and its driver after a collision with another boat.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer MacFadzen tracks a trapper suspected of poaching, and stealing a trail camera surveying the illegal traps. Officer Lucas investigates the death of an owl. And, officers question a father and son who may have hunted over illegal bait.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Sgt. Pushee leads a multi-agency rescue mission to find a missing kayaker. A specialist is called in to locate a pesky bear roaming a residential area, and a boy is caught riding without a helmet and operating his ATV illegally.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With the help of local police, Lt. Boudreau and Officer Hannett remove campers found illegally occupying state property. An 8-year-old boy is found riding solo on an ATV, and Officer Crouse helps two raccoon cubs found on the road.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A team of officers stakeout hunting sites across New Hampshire after reports of illegal activity. Officer Lopashanski investigates the mysterious discovery of untagged, unregistered deer parts hanging in front of a burnt-out building.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officers St. Pierre and Arsenault confront a bear that has made its winter den in a car. Officer McKee investigates a claim that an illegal deer kill was an accident. Lt. Boudreau stops a family of snowmobilers riding illegally on a highway.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As temperatures drop to near-freezing, Officers Canfield and Jones use an ROV to search Merrimack River for a missing person. Meanwhile, a man is caught illegally releasing coyotes from traps, and officers host a meet-and-greet at the headquarters.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When a call is made about two bobcats on the loose, Officer McKee must track them down before things escalate. A fisherman is caught concealing his unregistered snowmobile, and Officer Cyrs rushes to the site of a head-on snowmobile accident up north.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: On the Bald Mountain Trail, officers help rescue an injured hiker, but the icy trail puts the whole crew at risk. Officer Egan is the first medical responder to a sudden snowmobile crash, and two four-wheelers crash through ice on Webster Lake.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: At the annual ice fishing tournament in Washington, NH, numerous fishermen are cited for breaking the law. Meanwhile, Officer Canfield catches reckless snowmobilers riding without registrations then receives a call that has him rushing to the hospital.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A fisherman is arrested for shooting his friend, and a snowmobiler goes on someone's property without permission.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: After an abandoned barrel is discovered, Officer Hannett works with local police to see if it's related to a 20-year-old cold case regarding a missing mother and daughter. Later, the popular GoNorth Snofest starts with a bang and ends in citations.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When the embankment of the Upper Ammonoosuc River begins to erode near a cemetery, The Fish and Game Dive Team searches the water for gravestones and bodies. A hunter is caught without her license, and a loaded firearm puts lives at risk.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In the dark of the night, Officers Hannet and Masucci rush to the aid of an injured hiker trapped on Mount Monadnock. Lt. Cheney and Officer Jones patrol the Hooksett Dam where river herring are spawning, and a bear causes chaos at Twin Mountain.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A report of possible gunshots fired near a Police Chief's home has Officers on the hunt for answers, but what K9 Moxie discovers leads to a twist in the case. An ATV accident leaves a rider seriously injured, and a rabid raccoon puts lives in danger.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The New Hampshire Fish and Game Dive Team fights harsh conditions while on a double drowning mission at the Merrimack River. Officer Egan rescues a baby owl after the nest is disturbed, and a family of ATV riders are busted for breaking the law.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In Newton, NH, Officer Letourneau receives an interesting tip about a woman in possession of baby flying squirrels. Things take a turn for Officers investigating an ATV accident, and an OHRV rider is caught trespassing on restricted trails.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When a reckless UTV strikes Officer Holmes from behind, Officer Mancini helps him seek medical treatment while handling the crime scene. A car accident kills a doe leaving two twin fawns vulnerable, and firecrackers give a veteran intense flashbacks.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Gold Timers deal with thieves while the Dust Devils have machinery problems.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Rookie Justin ropes in a stranger in a mad dash to get his excavator across a busy highway. Opal Queen Kelly battles a new claim with a new partner. Then, with Col struck down with illness, Aaron and Greg must push on at Dragonfly without him.

programme.title: Bering Sea Gold
programme.desc: Kris must move fast in the face of a life-threatening incident. Vernon pushes a diver for a personal record. Shawn deals with a crack in the ice to keep on the trail of the Tomcod jackpot. Zeke sees signs of life just as his season is coming to an end.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The officers revisit cases involving their K-9 partners. Bob Mancini recalls tracking down a trespasser with Ruger. Boudreau honors Ruby's memory with a story about uncovering evidence of illegal hunting. And Fluette reflects on the day he met Moxie.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: The Gold Timers deal with thieves while the Dust Devils have machinery problems.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Rookie Justin ropes in a stranger in a mad dash to get his excavator across a busy highway. Opal Queen Kelly battles a new claim with a new partner. Then, with Col struck down with illness, Aaron and Greg must push on at Dragonfly without him.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As temperatures drop to near-freezing, Officers Canfield and Jones use an ROV to search Merrimack River for a missing person. Meanwhile, a man is caught illegally releasing coyotes from traps, and officers host a meet-and-greet at the headquarters.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: When a call is made about two bobcats on the loose, Officer McKee must track them down before things escalate. A fisherman is caught concealing his unregistered snowmobile, and Officer Cyrs rushes to the site of a head-on snowmobile accident up north.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: On the Bald Mountain Trail, officers help rescue an injured hiker, but the icy trail puts the whole crew at risk. Officer Egan is the first medical responder to a sudden snowmobile crash, and two four-wheelers crash through ice on Webster Lake.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: An alligator poacher brags online and Wardens go after him. Down on the border Wardens pull illegal nets from the river while looking for drug smugglers.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens go undercover to stop a black market for buying and selling wild animals. A trio of Wardens work the beaches of Galveston and mobilize when an oil spill threatens wildlife. A robotic deer decoy is used to catch night hunters.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A specialty team of Texas Game Wardens spends a week on a floating cabin to stop drug smuggling operations across the border. The K-9 unit is called in to investigate a woman who may be killing owls to sell exotic headdresses.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Across Texas, boating and fishing patrols are interrupted by record storms and flooding. Near Austin, Search and Rescue teams save multiple people from dangerous swift water and tornadoes. Wardens chase a felon with an illegal gun in East Texas.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens investigate a Jet Ski accident that sends an injured man to the hospital. The Wardens must track down a hunter shooting doves in a residential neighbourhood. On Lake Lewisville, Wardens deal with a partier who's had too much to drink.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens search for an alligator that bit a man and his 13-year old son. In West Texas, an abandoned car leads the Wardens to believe a teenage girl may be missing. A man is suspected of hunting on his neighbor's property without permission.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A team of Wardens deploy on a multi-county night operation to stop spotlighters and road hunters. Texas Game Wardens check teal hunters on opening weekend. A dead deer found with an arrow still in it leads Game Wardens to a poacher.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Dove season starts off with a bang, keeping wardens across the state busy from sunrise to sundown. Texas Game Wardens must relocate a 500-lb gator that's loose in a suburban area. Wardens uncover a large marijuana grow-op hidden in a wildlife preserve.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens search for the illusive big horn sheep in the mountains of West Texas. A family near Houston reports shots from a neighboring ranch are raining down on their home. Wardens track down a bow hunter, incriminated by his own game camera.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's the start of deer season, and the Texas woods are filled with hunters trying to bag a prize buck. Game Wardens are busy checking hunters across the state, while also investigating a rash of deer stand thefts, and rescuing a trio of baby hawks.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens patrol the southern border for illegal fishing activity and the northern border for a trapper who may be selling live coyotes. Game Wardens go undercover to stop someone suspected of harassing deer hunters.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Wardens check hunting camps at the height of deer season. On the Rio Grande River, they stop a Mexican fisherman from poaching in U.S. waters. A Game Warden near Austin must rescue a trapped deer and get it to a rehabber.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: This modified Boeing 707 is one of only two 707 tankers in the world that provide commercial air-to-air refuelling to the American military. Omega Aerial Refuelling Services was launched in the late 1980s and these tankers are constantly in demand.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Slicing through the eye wall of a hurricane, pounded by howling winds, blinded by rain and hail, NOAA's hurricane hunting WP-3D Orion aircraft flies where other planes refuse to venture. Witness the action as Hurricane Leslie threatens Bermuda and Canada.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Travel with Donald Trump aboard his luxurious Boeing 757 on a transatlantic mission to the U.K. for a speech and pit stop at his new golf course in Scotland. Fog, runway curfews and security sweeps are just a few of the challenges faced by Captain Dunkin.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-17 Globemaster III is the newest, most flexible cargo aircraft to enter the United States airlift force. The C-17 Globemaster specializes in quick delivery of troops and all types of cargo and can land and take off on short, rough runways.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: In 2010, the largest airborne observatory in the world opened its infrared eye for the first time from aboard a modified Boeing 747 jumbo jetliner. SOFIA boasts a 17-ton telescope capable of making observations impossible for ground-based telescopes.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes as the Blue Angels perform the last two shows of their season. Follow this group of Top Guns through the unique, specialized training and delve into the physics of their spectacular aerobatic flying.

programme.title: Airplane Repo
programme.desc: Ken and Danny must race to beat out rival repo men on the biggest yacht heist of their careers. Mike finds himself in a high stakes game of 'chicken' between a six million dollar Lear jet and a Lamborghini.

programme.desc: Rob Lowe welcomes new contestants including a competitive baton twirler, a CSI Forensic Scientist, a former Navy Cryptologist and a Pre-Med Student, one of whom may defeat the Circle of Samurai and win more than $100,000.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: When the tailfin blows off a huge Japan Airlines Boeing 747, pilots manage to keep the plane in the air for 30 minutes before slamming into a remote mountain. This episode focuses on aspects of air safety and investigates the stories behind major crashes.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: On a routine mission, the crew of a FedEx plane is attacked shortly after takeoff from Memphis. Upon investigation, the three-man crew had to struggle to control their plane and perform incredible feats as their attacker threatened their lives.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Investigate a case where a Super Puma helicopter was making a routine journey to a North Sea oil platform. The travel took place during extreme weather conditions when in a flash, sixteen passengers and crew found themselves struggling to survive.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Question what went horribly wrong after a Boeing 767 slammed into the Atlantic Ocean off the coast of Nantucket, killing all 217 passengers on-board. After analyzing all the possible malfunctions, a shocking answer to the horrible tragedy is determined.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: An investigation has revealed that a shocking event led to the terrible crash of a flight from Moscow to Hong Kong. An event of poor training forced the plane from the sky merely five minutes after lift-off, killing every single passenger of board.

programme.desc: A single father comes to Villalobos hoping to find a new companion for himself and his son after a hard break-up. Mariah and Toney rescue a puppy that is at risk of never walking again unless he gets surgery.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia makes a heart-wrenching discovery when she takes a rescue to the vet. The community gets behind Earle to help raise money for surgery. Mariah must conquer one of her biggest fears.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: After more than ten years in the kennels, a survivor from Hurricane Katrina gets a chance at a forever home. Then, when Matt and Louise head out in search of a loose pit bull they discover more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When a blind pit bull is attacked by other dogs, the Villalobos team steps-in and takes responsibility for his recovery. Also, a couple from Pittsburgh mourning the loss of their pit bull visits Villalobos and fall in love with one of Tia's favorite dogs.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia battles a local shelter on the fate of a pit bull she risked it all to save. Another dog that was rescued from death has a chance at a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A new season brings new challenges as Villalobos Rescue Centre expands beyond New Orleans.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A challenge comes in the form of a stray dog stuck in the swamp, Tia takes in two sickly puppies from an overwhelmed owner, and one of Villalobos favourite residents finally finds a chance at a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Sui, ready for more responsibility, tests herself by taking the lead in a rescue. An adopter looks for a dog that will feel at home around her many chickens and Tia rescues a pit bull with scars that reveal a painful past.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia Maria Torres works to save pit bulls from dangerous and abusive situations.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A New Hampshire family travels south to find a new family companion, a call about an aggressive dog leads to a heartbreaking discovery, and Earl visits a spine specialist to try to put an end to years of pain.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When Tania and Matt try to rescue a stray, Matt gets the scare of a lifetime and Tania takes over. A new recruit learns the heartbreak that comes with a life in dog rescue. And one of Villalobos' favorite ladies finally has a shot at a home of her own.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and her staff scramble to coax a scared dog, hiding under a vehicle, to safety. Tania's in-laws are seeking a new addition to their home. Tia's son Moe and his fiancée Lizzy prepare for their wedding day.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia attempts to rescue a scared pit bull after he is abandoned by his owners in an empty house. A mother and daughter from Oklahoma arrive in New Orleans, seeking a new best friend. And Tia's personal dog, Jethro, falls dangerously ill.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A dog's chance at a forever home is put at risk when a tumor is found. Tia faces a tough decision when an aggressive dog becomes a danger to her staff. VRC tries to reunite a stray dog with its owner.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: With the holidays quickly approaching, Tia surprises her family, the parolees and every dog at the rescue with an extraordinary gift. But turning this giant gift into something Villalobos can actually use will require herculean effort.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: In the 100th episode, Tia and team try to nurse a dog back to health in one of the worse cases of neglect they have ever seen. And, ten years after Hurricane Katrina, one of the survivors finally has a shot at forever home. Includes a special Aftershow.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When a tornado tears through New Orleans, Tania takes charge but is furious when the parolees fail to show up to help. A fellow pit bull trainer seeks Tia's help adopting a dog she can put to work.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees

programme.title: Victorian Slum House

programme.title: Victorian Slum House
programme.desc: Enter the 1890s, when mass manufacturing and social reform offer a bit of hope for some of the residents, while others are plagued by a water shortage that dashes hopes for a promising laundry business.

programme.title: Victorian Slum House

programme.desc: These animals are so close to their owners they're human-like.

programme.title: Unlikely Animal Friends
programme.desc: True friendship can heal a variety of wounds and these pals are there for each other no matter what.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: New Brunswick’s Campobello Island is Canadian more by chance than by geography. The only year round and direct access to the mainland is a bridge to the US, which makes for a unique Canadian/American cultural blend and many challenges.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Jonny is in Schreiber in Northern Ontario, where immigrants from Siderno, Italy left for a better life. While the mines, mills and railways have declined, the Mom-and-Pop shots, strong family ties, and unique heritage keep this struggling community alive.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Jonny visits Harrison Hot Springs, BC, a town doubling down on creating a year round economy outside the resort, and hopes their other claim to fame, the elusive Sasquatch, will be the ticket.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Jonny is in East Preston, NS, one of Canada's oldest indigenous black communities with a history that begins more than a hundred years before Canada itself.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: In May 2017, the Polar Bear Capital of the World unexpectedly became a fly-in community. A year of skyrocketing costs and unemployment are taking their toll but the community continues to hang on by its Northern grit, ingenuity and community spirit.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: If all goes well, Canadians will soon be able to drive from Fortune, NL to a little-known corner of France. With that will come a boost in tourism and employment opportunities, a welcome change from a decade of decline.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Nipigon took a beating after its plywood mill burnt down. Today, the former mill town says it has 'a natural edge' and its the trumpeting the world-class hiking, climbing and fishing it has to offer.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Once the homeport of pirates, and the launch pad of Amelia Earhart, Harbour Grace, NL, is a shadow of what it once was. The town is littered with crumbling monuments to its past greatness.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Gravelbourg is facing an economic battle that’s led to outmigration, and a decline in French culture. In recent years, many different nationalities have settled in the town. This growing international population is helping maintain the local economy.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Changing tastes and a shifting economy brought by the disappearance of its industries have left the once vacation destination of Bristol, Quebec looking to get its mojo back. Now a new group of entrepreneurs is trying to make Bristol a destination again.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: After losing its major lumber mills, Lumby lost not only hundreds of jobs, but also its sense of identity. Now the town is emerging, hopeful with a diverse economy that includes arts, culture and a 40-acre grow-op that’s hoping to make pot for pets.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Every year, lots of people come to Calabogie for the ski slopes, raceway, winding roads and golf courses, but those who call Calabogie home year-round have gone without a backbone industry since its days as a resource town in the '60s.

programme.title: Still Standing
programme.desc: Over five years later, the Siksika Nation reserve is still dealing with the effects of a flood, but they hope the end is near. Now they use creativity, guidance from their knowledge keeper and plain old guts to build a future of good news.

programme.desc: When a Georgia mom is murdered, a cold case with a similar MO is uncovered.

programme.title: Secrets of the Morgue
programme.desc: A wealthy woman disappears from her upscale Ohio retirement village. Days later, her body is found in the trunk of her abandoned car.

programme.title: Secrets of the Morgue

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The OKC crew heads south to race at the Texas Motorplex in the American Outlaws Live event; more organized than the sport has ever been, this event may be the precursor to a national league of street racers.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Frustration mounts on the 405 list. Racers try to hang on instead of move up. Farmtruck and AZN improve the Farmtruck, and test it out in a fishing race. On race night, things heat up when Dave makes a callout for a race he has no intention of racing.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's the last list race of the season, and that means the pressure is on for everyone to make their final moves towards the top. Kamikaze and Farmtruck both make their triumphant returns to list racing, and there will be a new number one on the 405 list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When JJ 'Da Boss' from Memphis invites the 405 to race, they leave their pro-mods at home and head east to the craziest race ever. Chuck is ready to prove himself, and the Memphis guys give the OKC racers a run for their money.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief decides to put on a first-of-its-kind team race-off. Detroit, New York and California each bring a team to compete against OKC. Five of the 405's most OG racers step up to prove again that OKC has the fastest group of street racers in the country.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The new season of Street Outlaws is about to begin and the 405 is moving away from Pro-mods on the street, so Chief and Shawn take a look back at how far the 405 has come since before the show. Then, we show some deleted scenes from the big Mega Race.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Street Outlaws is back, and the guys in the 405 are making big changes. Chief decides to kick all the Pro-mods off the list. Then, it's time for an old school shakeup, everyone loses their spots and has to race to find out where they belong on the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After the list shakeup, the 405 has an entirely new list, but everyone is still fighting to get to the top. With Dave down for repairs, Chuck, Ryan, Shawn and Monza battle to try to take the top spot, while Doc tries to get himself out of the bottom five.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: This week's race is all about the very top of the list and the very bottom. Ryan and Chuck are getting ready to battle for #1 again. At the bottom of the list, Farmtruck is feeling the heat and he does everything he can to hold onto a spot on the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With Chief ready to take his new car up the list one more time, Reaper struggles to get his car fixed in time for race night. Meanwhile, Farmtruck and AZN think outside the box to round up some races, now that the truck is off the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When JJ and his racers from Memphis come to OKC for two nights of racing, everyone in the 405 has to step up and get ready to lay it all on the line. But, after flagging and technicalities cause drama, the 405 has to fight for every win.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Now that Chief is back on the list, he and Shawn map out a plan to get themselves back into the top spots. Farmtruck sets AZN up with a race against a doctor with a super car, and at race night, Doc seems like he finally has his car figured out.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With only a few list races left, everyone gets serious about moving up the list. AZN gets a new tune for the Dung Beetle and tests out the improvements. On race night, when Doc gets into trouble, Chief pounces on his chance to make big moves up the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's the last list race of the season, and everyone in the 405 is looking to make one more move towards the top. Then, on race night, some of the top guys don't bring their cars, and plans to move up the list blow up in Doc's and Chief's faces.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Everyone who's anyone in street racing shows up to a race hosted by JJ 'Da Boss' from Memphis.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.desc: Street Outlaws favourites duke it out with newcomers to become 'no prep winners.'.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Sixteen racers step up to represent their teams in Team Attack for a chance to win $15,000. But after a rainstorm sweeps over the Georgia track, racers must contend with one of the most treacherous surfaces they'll see all season.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Everyone who's anyone in street racing shows up to a race hosted by JJ 'Da Boss' from Memphis.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chuck takes us back through every season of the show to look at the races and the strategies that got racers to the number one spot on OKC's top ten list. Chuck talks about what it takes to wear the 405 crown.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The 405 heads Memphis, bringing everyone with them. However, that means racing on JJ's slick, asphalt road. When the 405's plan to stick together falls apart, they struggle to set up the right races and it looks like Memphis might get the best of them.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: As the epic battle between OKC and Memphis continues, Farmtruck and AZN take a look back at what happened between Memphis and the 405 to get them here. A big rematch between Chief and JJ promises to be another night for the history books.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chuck and Ryan look back at some of the biggest rivalries we've seen on the 405 list, while Farmtruck and AZN go head to head in a junky, clunker race. Then, Chuck and Ryan take a look forward at everything that's coming up on this season.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's the first list race of the season and that means everyone is gearing up for a fight. Then, with Chief's car down for repairs, Shawn tries to jump on the number one spot. But when Doc tries to hold off on racing Reaper, chaos breaks out on race night.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief commits to fall down the list on purpose in order to race everyone he missed on his last trip to the top. Meanwhile, Ryan and Chuck struggle to get their cars ready. Then, Shawn goes after Chuck in an attempt to take the OG Murder Nova back.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With Chief out of town, Chuck takes over as racemaster, but still has to defend number one. Farmtruck and AZN dig up a new kind of race. Then on race night, with racers missing, Monza and Dave jump into the top five while Ryan tries to take Chuck's Crown.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's time for another list race in the 405 and new number one, Ryan Martin is getting ready to defend his crown. On race night, Big Chief is back and he's brought new rules that are going to make race night move faster.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Doc is determined to make a comeback with the Street Beast. Big Chief and Kamikaze decide it's time for the El Camino to race for the list. Farmtruck and AZN go after redemption with an old rival with the Dung Beetle.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's time for Outlaw Armageddon, the country's biggest and baddest no prep race, which means nearly 40 of the fastest street and track racers from all over the country are descending on OKC to compete for a whopping $40,000 prize.

programme.desc: Street Outlaws favourites duke it out with newcomers to become 'no prep winners.'.

programme.desc: In New Hampshire, Lizzy reveals a new car and Brandon James makes his debut. Murder Nova eyes up another run to the finals but will have to go through heavy hitters from NOLA and Dean's List.

programme.desc: It's time for Outlaw Armageddon, the country's biggest and baddest no prep race, which means nearly 40 of the fastest street and track racers from all over the country are descending on OKC to compete for a whopping $40,000 prize.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After the first round of Outlaw Armageddon, there are still 19 of the best racers in the country left to fight it out for the $40,000 pot. The remaining 405 racers must fight to defend their turf, because being beat at their home track isn't an option.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The new rules mean that the racers at the top of the list are stuck waiting for callouts, but there's plenty of drama in the bottom five. While Kamikaze struggles to make it to race night, Jeff Lutz and Dominator prepare to battle to get back on the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When Farmtruck decides to host the first ever 405 Daily Driver Shootout, most of the drivers in OKC drag out their grocery getters to compete. But in the 405, daily drivers are anything but ordinary.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With only two list races left in the season, the drivers work to get their cars race ready. Farmtruck and AZN prepare for racing with some fishing. On race night Ryan is finally able to defend his number one spot, and tempers flare between Doc and Monza.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's the final list race of the season and everyone is aiming to move up. Murder Nova races Farmtruck for the first time and Ryan fights to reclaim the number one spot. Chaos breaks out when Doc refuses a callout.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Full Throttle - No Prep Kings
Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Street Outlaws go in depth into how the show began and talk about what happened when producers came to Oklahoma for the very first time. They talk about their favorite moments from the show, and about how Street Outlaws has changed them.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When Reaper gets a smack talking call from a local dirt track owner, it turns into a dirt race challenge for the whole 405. After some testing, everyone from OKC comes to the dirt track to try and prove they can be king of the street and king of the dirt.

programme.title: Street Outlaws

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana (Al Pacino) stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fueled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

However, grandpa doesn't give up easily, and it turns into an all-out war between the two.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: This Hollywood drama is based on the events of the Apollo 13 lunar mission, astronauts Jim Lovell (Tom Hanks), Fred Haise (Bill Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Kevin Bacon) find everything going according to plan after leaving Earth's orbit. However, when an oxygen tank explodes, the scheduled moon landing is called off. Subsequent tensions within the crew and numerous technical problems threaten both the astronauts' survival and their safe return to Earth.

programme.title: The Humans

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: In 1805, aboard the H.M.S. Though Napoleon is winning the war and the men and their crew face an onslaught of obstacles, including their own internal battles, "Lucky Jack" is determined that nothing will stop the Surprise from completing its mission.

Boarding the German ship, the Americans' cover as a rescue force is quickly blown. Forced to take the crew hostage, the Americans lay their explosives and prepare to destroy the German vessel before the Nazis can send naval backup.

programme.title: Dirty Tricks
programme.desc: At the elite level, bridge has become a million-dollar cut-throat business. When a competitive player is accused of cheating, the ensuing scandal confounds experts, criminal science, celebrities and basic belief.

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes
programme.desc: On one of trapped housewife Evelyn Couch's (Kathy Bates) Wednesday nursing home visits, she encounters Ninny Threadgoode (Jessica Tandy), a colorful old woman who brightens Evelyn's outlook by sharing tales from her past. As Ninny recounts the exploits of her free-spirited sister-in-law Idgie (Mary Stuart Masterson), owner of a small Alabama café in the 1920s, and the bond Idgie shared with her friend Ruth (Mary-Louise Parker), Evelyn gains the confidence to change her own life for the better.

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: The discovery that she has a terminal illness prompts introverted saleswoman Georgia Byrd (Queen Latifah) to reflect on what she realizes has been an overly cautious life. So Georgia withdraws her life savings and jets off to Europe where she lives like a millionaire. Upbeat and passionate, Georgia charms everybody she meets, including renowned Chef Didier (Gérard Depardieu). The only one missing from her new life is her longtime crush Sean Matthews (LL Cool J).

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Samantha Kingston (Zoey Deutch) seems to have it all: popularity, a loving boyfriend (Kian Lawley) and a seemingly perfect future. Everything changes in the blink of an eye when she dies in a car crash but then magically wakes up to find herself reliving the same day over and over again. As Samantha tries to untangle the mystery of a life derailed, she must also unravel the secrets of the people closest to her and discover how the power of a single day can make a difference.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: The discovery that she has a terminal illness prompts introverted saleswoman Georgia Byrd (Queen Latifah) to reflect on what she realizes has been an overly cautious life. So Georgia withdraws her life savings and jets off to Europe where she lives like a millionaire. Upbeat and passionate, Georgia charms everybody she meets, including renowned Chef Didier (Gérard Depardieu). The only one missing from her new life is her longtime crush Sean Matthews (LL Cool J).

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: In Fabric
programme.desc: A lonely divorcee visits a bewitching London department store to find a dress to transform her life. She soon finds a perfect, artery-red gown that unleashes a malevolent, unstoppable curse.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Following a ridiculously awful flight that leads to his pet's death, Nashawn Wade (Kevin Hart) files a lawsuit against the airline, and wins a multimillion-dollar settlement. Determined to create a better flying experience, Nashawn starts his own airline, one that caters to an African-American clientele. Going into business with a tricked-out plane piloted by the smooth Capt. Mack (Snoop "Doggy" Dogg), the airline hits a snag when it has to deal with the family of Elvis Hunkee (Tom Arnold).

programme.title: The To Do List
programme.desc: It's 1993, and high-school valedictorian Brandy Klark (Aubrey Plaza) decides she needs to shed her uptight image before college. She puts together a list of all the activities -- including sex -- she missed in high school. When she soon realizes she is out of her depth, Brandy enlists the aid of her friends, older sister, and boss. Summer marches on, and members of the group realize that they will need plenty of imagination and open mindedness to complete her project before September.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Prior to his untimely death, Jackson was in the midst of preparing for a series of sold-out concerts that were scheduled to take place in London during the summer of 2009. Behind-the-scenes footage, filmed between March and June of 2009, captures the pop superstar in intimate detail as he developed and rehearsed for the "This Is It" tour.

programme.title: Scary Movie V
programme.desc: Much bizarre activity follows after a husband (Simon Rex) and wife (Ashley Tisdale) bring their newborn infant home from the hospital. When they realize that a demon is stalking their family, they consult paranormal specialists and install numerous cameras to drive out the pesky spirit. Movies that are spoofed in the familiar format include the "Paranormal Activity" franchise, "Mama," "Sinister," "Evil Dead," "Inception," "Black Swan" and "Rise of the Planet of the Apes.".

programme.title: My Salinger Year
programme.desc: While working for literary agent Phyllis Westberg, aspiring writer Joanna Rakoff receives personal advice from reclusive author J.D. Salinger.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: Opera singer Jessica Bailey's flight to her concert in Vienna gets delayed and she is stuck in a remote area of England. The only place to stay is a bed-and-breakfast in an enchanting village run by a handsome widower named Andrew.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Christmas at the Chateau
programme.desc: Three sisters try to save the Shakespeare Chateau, a historic mansion and beloved family home, from a corrupt bank that threatens to foreclose on Christmas Day.

programme.title: American Christmas
programme.desc: After another ruined Christmas dinner, a mother is determined to make her family reflect on their misdeeds.

programme.title: Gloria Bell
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: My Salinger Year
programme.desc: While working for literary agent Phyllis Westberg, aspiring writer Joanna Rakoff receives personal advice from reclusive author J.D. Salinger.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Songs My Brothers Taught Me
programme.desc: Johnny and his sister Jashuan live with their single mother on a reservation. When their absentee father dies, Johnny feels compelled to strike out for a new life in LA, but fears leaving his sister behind.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Crotchety Victorian businessman Ebenezer Scrooge (Alastair Sim) has no use for festivity, even at Christmas. After resentfully allowing timid clerk Bob Cratchit (Mervyn Johns) to have the holiday to spend with his loving wife (Hermione Baddeley) and family, Scrooge is swept into a nightmare. The ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley (Michael Hordern), appears, warning that Ebenezer will be visited by three more spirits who will show the coldhearted man the error of his parsimonious behavior.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol

After resentfully allowing timid clerk Bob Cratchit (Mervyn Johns) to have the holiday to spend with his loving wife (Hermione Baddeley) and family, Scrooge is swept into a nightmare. The ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley (Michael Hordern), appears, warning that Ebenezer will be visited by three more spirits who will show the coldhearted man the error of his parsimonious behavior.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Rodgers & Hammerstein musical, widowed Welsh mother Anna Loenowens (Deborah Kerr) becomes a governess and English tutor to the wives and many children of the stubborn King Mongkut of Siam (Yul Brynner). Anna and the king have a clash of personalities as she works to teach the royal family about the English language, customs and etiquette, and rushes to prepare a party for a group of European diplomats who must change their opinions about the king.

programme.title: How to Be Very, Very Popular
programme.desc: A showgirl from the San Francisco cabaret is murdered, and the only witnesses are fellow showgirls Stormy Tornado (Betty Grable) and Curly Flagg (Sheree North). Afraid of both the murderers and the cops, the two go on the run, eventually deciding to pose as male students at Bristol College. Neither girl can avoid the spotlight for too long, though, and their constant desire to stand out among the crowd eventually gets the better of them, resulting in their cover being blown.

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lorelei Lee (Marilyn Monroe) is a beautiful showgirl engaged to be married to the wealthy Gus Esmond (Tommy Noonan), much to the disapproval of Gus' rich father, Esmond Sr., who thinks that Lorelei is just after his money. When Lorelei goes on a cruise accompanied only by her best friend, Dorothy Shaw (Jane Russell), Esmond Sr. hires Ernie Malone (Elliott Reid), a private detective, to follow her and report any questionable behavior that would disqualify her from the marriage.

programme.title: State Fair
programme.desc: The small-town Frake family attend the Iowa State Fair, the annual highlight of their summer. Son Wayne (Dick Haymes) plots revenge on a midway barker (Henry Morgan) who had embarrassed him the summer before and falls for the beautiful singer Emily (Vivian Blaine), while his melancholy sister Margie (Jeanne Crain) becomes smitten with slick city-boy reporter Pat (Dana Andrews). Meanwhile, mother Melissa (Fay Bainter) and father Abel (Charles Winninger) plot to win their respective competitions.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Rodgers & Hammerstein musical, widowed Welsh mother Anna Loenowens (Deborah Kerr) becomes a governess and English tutor to the wives and many children of the stubborn King Mongkut of Siam (Yul Brynner). Anna and the king have a clash of personalities as she works to teach the royal family about the English language, customs and etiquette, and rushes to prepare a party for a group of European diplomats who must change their opinions about the king.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Kaaapowie! Holy feature film, Batman ... one based on the tongue-in-cheek, campy 1960's television series. Watch Batman (Adam West) and Robin (Burt Ward) battle sharks, Catwoman, The Joker and The Riddler on the big screen. Can they try to prevent the bad guys from taking over the world? With a wham! and a pow! and a zip! ... our heroes just might win.

programme.title: A Dog's Journey
programme.desc: Bailey is living the good life on the Michigan farm of his boy, Ethan and Ethan's wife Hannah. He even has a new playmate: Ethan and Hannah's baby granddaughter, CJ. The problem is that CJ's mom, Gloria, decides to take CJ away. As Bailey's soul prepares to leave this life for a new one, he makes a promise to Ethan to find CJ and protect her at any cost. Thus begins Bailey's adventure through many lives filled with love, friendship, and devotion.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Denny Swift is a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life. Besides his career, Denny has three loves of his life -- his beautiful wife, their young daughter and his best friend, which is a dog that wants to be reincarnated into a human.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: Growing up in the early 1800s, P.T. Barnum displays a natural talent for publicity and promotion, selling lottery tickets by age 12. After trying his hands at various jobs, P.T. turns to show business to indulge his limitless imagination, rising from nothing to create the Barnum & Bailey circus. Featuring catchy musical numbers, exotic performers and daring acrobatic feats, Barnum's mesmerizing spectacle soon takes the world by storm to become the greatest show on Earth.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: Growing up in the early 1800s, P.T. Barnum displays a natural talent for publicity and promotion, selling lottery tickets by age 12. programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: State Fair

Son Wayne (Dick Haymes) plots revenge on a midway barker (Henry Morgan) who had embarrassed him the summer before and falls for the beautiful singer Emily (Vivian Blaine), while his melancholy sister Margie (Jeanne Crain) becomes smitten with slick city-boy reporter Pat (Dana Andrews). Meanwhile, mother Melissa (Fay Bainter) and father Abel (Charles Winninger) plot to win their respective competitions.

programme.title: The Abominable Snowman of the Himalayas
programme.desc: British scientist John Rollason (Peter Cushing) is studying plants in the Himalayas with his wife (Maureen Connell) while he waits for his American associate, Tom Friend (Forrest Tucker). When Friend arrives, Rollason accompanies him on a trip to find the mysterious creature Yeti, along with Friend's partner (Robert Brown) and a guide (Michael Brill) who claims he can find the beast. The group proceeds despite warnings. However, the trip quickly becomes more dangerous than they had anticipated.

programme.title: Witchcraft
programme.desc: For generations, the Whitlocks and the Laniers have been feuding, including when Vanessa Whitlock (Yvette Rees), accused of being a witch, was buried alive centuries ago. Now Bill Lanier (Jack Hedley) wants to dig up a burial ground for development purposes, and Morgan Whitlock (Lon Chaney Jr.) tries to stop him. Soon, unexplainable accidents start to happen to members of the Lanier family, throwing suspicion on Morgan. The real truth Bill discovers is much more sinister than he expected.

programme.title: House of the Damned
programme.desc: An architect and his wife encounter bizarre occurrences as they survey a mansion built by an eccentric heiress.

programme.title: The Innocents
programme.desc: Based on the Henry James story "The Turn of the Screw," a psychological thriller about a woman who takes a governess job for two orphans in a Victorian home. She begins to see what she believes are ghosts and suspects the children's bizarre behavior is the result of supernatural powers.

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: Six adventurous strangers travel to a mysterious building to experience the escape room -- a game where players compete to solve a series of puzzles to win $10,000. What starts out as seemingly innocent fun soon turns into a living nightmare as the four men and two women discover each room is an elaborate trap that's part of a sadistic game of life or death.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: Through hope, determination, sacrifice and the drive to protect families and communities, the Granite Mountain Hotshots become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the country. While most people run from danger, they run toward it -- watching over lives, homes and everything people hold dear, forging a unique brotherhood that comes into focus with one fateful fire in Yarnell, Ariz.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for a terrorist attack on the Kremlin, Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and the entire IMF agency are disavowed by the U.S. government, while the president initiates the Ghost Protocol. Forced to go "off the grid" -- left without resources or backup -- Hunt must somehow clear the agency's name and prevent another attack. Complicating matters even more, Ethan must undertake the impossible mission with a group of fellow IMF fugitives whose actual motives are suspect.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for a terrorist attack on the Kremlin, Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and the entire IMF agency are disavowed by the U.S. government, while the president initiates the Ghost Protocol. Forced to go "off the grid" -- left without resources or backup -- Hunt must somehow clear the agency's name and prevent another attack. Complicating matters even more, Ethan must undertake the impossible mission with a group of fellow IMF fugitives whose actual motives are suspect.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy (Will Ferrell) was accidentally transported to the North Pole as a toddler and raised to adulthood among Santa's elves. Unable to shake the feeling that he doesn't fit in, the adult Buddy travels to New York, in full elf uniform, in search of his real father. As it happens, this is Walter Hobbs (James Caan), a cynical businessman. After a DNA test proves this, Walter reluctantly attempts to start a relationship with the childlike Buddy with increasingly chaotic results.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy (Will Ferrell) was accidentally transported to the North Pole as a toddler and raised to adulthood among Santa's elves. Unable to shake the feeling that he doesn't fit in, the adult Buddy travels to New York, in full elf uniform, in search of his real father. As it happens, this is Walter Hobbs (James Caan), a cynical businessman. After a DNA test proves this, Walter reluctantly attempts to start a relationship with the childlike Buddy with increasingly chaotic results.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder (Adam Sandler) moves his family back to his hometown to be with his friends, but he finds -- what with old bullies, new bullies, party crashers and more -- that he hasn't left the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Lenny's friends must also cope with their own challenges: Eric (Kevin James) must face his ultimate fear; Kurt (Chris Rock) has gone back to work as a cable repairman; and Marcus (David Spade) learns that he has an 18-year-old son.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Tariq races against the clock for Yasmine; with pressure being placed on Monet, she struggles to wear the Tejada crown.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature violently kills a man in a Maine lake, Jack Wells (Bill Pullman), the local game warden, looks into the bizarre case, along with Sheriff Hank Keough (Brendan Gleeson) and visiting paleontologist Kelly Scott (Bridget Fonda). Looking for clues in a tooth that the beast left behind, Kelly and the others eventually locate the monster, a massive and vicious reptile eager to devour anything in its path. Can the crocodile-like creature be stopped?

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills. When hotshot fighter pilot Maverick (Tom Cruise) is sent to the school, his reckless attitude and cocky demeanor put him at odds with the other pilots, especially the cool and collected Iceman (Val Kilmer). But Maverick isn't only competing to be the top fighter pilot, he's also fighting for the attention of his beautiful flight instructor, Charlotte Blackwood (Kelly McGillis).

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: After her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella (Lily James) finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother (Cate Blanchett) and stepsisters, who reduce her to scullery maid. Despite her circumstances, she refuses to despair. An invitation to a palace ball gives Ella hope that she might reunite with the dashing stranger (Richard Madden) she met in the woods, but her stepmother prevents her from going. Help arrives in the form of a kindly beggar woman who has a magic touch for ordinary things.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Finally alone for the holidays, Luther (Tim Allen) and Nora Krank (Jamie Lee Curtis) plan to eschew the Christmas traditions and take a cruise in the Caribbean instead. This doesn't sit well with their Christmas-obsessed neighbors Vic Frohmeyer (Dan Aykroyd) and Walt Scheel (M. Emmet Walsh), who are determined to win the annual "best decorated street" competition, and the Kranks soon find themselves social outcasts because of their lack of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder (Adam Sandler) moves his family back to his hometown to be with his friends, but he finds -- what with old bullies, new bullies, party crashers and more -- that he hasn't left the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Lenny's friends must also cope with their own challenges: Eric (Kevin James) must face his ultimate fear; Kurt (Chris Rock) has gone back to work as a cable repairman; and Marcus (David Spade) learns that he has an 18-year-old son.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves - or they'll be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Top Gun
